title: Shawl (?)
marks:
Inscription

near fringe on one end, in blue: [N
description: very similar to L2012.161.44; red, tan and gold plaid with fringed ends; one edge has 2 red stripes opposite has 2 green stripes; 3 blue balls and 18 small black of gray balls along one fringed end;  one blue ball, one black ball and one gray ball along the other end
